html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09862018-07-09,  ,  TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectInterim Order Respecting Battery-powered Hand-held Lasers
PrecisOrder approving INTERIM ORDER RESPECTING BATTERY-POWERED HAND-HELD LASERS, made by the Minister of Transport, in order to address the high safety risks associated with laser attacks on aircraft by prohibiting possession of hand-held lasers with an output greater than 1 mW within the immediate vicinity of certified aerodromes and heliports where the majority of laser strikes occur. The intended result is a swift reduction in the number of laser strikes on aircraft and enhanced enforcement for offences through immediate issuance of administrative monetary penalties.
AttachmentsAttachment
